mapper.sql: orderid, clientid, hotelid, roomtype, timestart, timeend, price, status, commentstar, commentcontent
mapper.select: select clientid from 'order' where hotelid = #{hotelid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and 'status'=2 and commentstar!=null limit 0,2
mapper.insert: insert into order (orderid, clientid, hotelid, roomtype, timestart, timeend, price, status, commentstar, commentcontent) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hotelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentstar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
